Magic Notes:
Magic Initiate (Druid): Know 2 D0 spells, cast 1 D1/long rest
Balm Of Peace: Use Channel Divinity to move 30' w/out OA and heal 2d6+4 HP to each target w/in 5'
Divine Intervention: 100% chance of deity help 1/wk
Elemental Adept (Acid): Acid spells ignore resistance; treat 1s as 2s on damage die
Elemental Adept (Lightning): Lightning spells ignore resistance; treat 1s as 2s on damage die
Embodiment Of The Law: Cast Enchantment spells as bonus action 4/long rest
Emboldening Bond: R30' 6 willing targets gain +1d4 on 1 attack, ability, or saving throw/rd when w/in 30' of each other for 10 min 6/long rest
Expansive Bond: Protective Bond works at 60' and grants resistance to damage
Harness Divine Power: Use Channel Divinity to regain spell slot up to level 3 3/long rest
Order's Demand: R30' Use Channel Divinity to charm targets (DC 18 Wis neg) for 1 rd
Potent Spellcasting: +4 Cleric cantrip damage
Protective Bond: Emboldening Bond member can use Reaction to teleport 30' and take another's damage
Ritual Casting: Cast known spell as ritual
Twilight Sanctuary: Use Channel Divinity for 30' radius that gives 1d6+20 temporary HP and ends charm or fright for 1 min
Twilight Shroud: Twilight Sanctuary gives half cover
Voice Of Authority: Self spell target can use Reaction to make attack
